item.title: Some desperate travelers turn to U-Haul as the government shutdown cuts flights and sends car rentals soaring
item.description: Meanwhile, Amtrak expects more bookings, and bus services are preparing for more demand.

item.title: Trump asks Justice Department to probe meatpackers on prices
item.description: Trump’s decision to impose a 50% tariffs on products from Brazil over diplomatic disputes also affected their beef exports.

item.title: Frontier’s CEO on air travel reductions: Buy a second plane ticket from competitors if you ‘don’t want to be stranded’

item.title: AI reasoning models that can ‘think’ are more vulnerable to jailbreak attacks, new research suggests
item.description: A new study suggests that the advanced reasoning powering today’s AI models can weaken their safety systems.

item.title: The last monkey on the loose among several that escaped after a Mississippi highway crash has been found and captured
